about_the_game:
Build Rockets (coming soon)


Assemble custom rockets and spaceships from simple parts to find the right combination to reach your objectives!
We are developing a custom physics engine to reduce computational load, enabling higher performance for exploding rockets!

Shoot your Rockets into Space (coming soon)


Pilot your ship all the way from the launchpad to the surface of distant worlds!
This will become reality as soon as the surface and atmosphere simulation are added to our engine.

Explore the Solar System (work in progress)


Fly through the Solar System in real scale using our custom orbital engine that support very high accuracy calculations. No more round-off errors!

Non-Impulsive Maneuver


Our custom engine let you play with complex maneuvers and original trajectories.

features


  • realistic simulation of orbital dynamics using Kepler laws and patched conics
  • custom engine aimed for high performance and high precision
  • smooth orbit rendering even in extreme cases
  • deterministic simulation independent of time-wrap and SoI changes
  • efficient physics simulation of ship dynamics using Runge-Kutta 4
  • support for high time-wraps even while under acceleration
  • accurate itinerary planning
detailed_description:
Build Rockets (coming soon)


Assemble custom rockets and spaceships from simple parts to find the right combination to reach your objectives!
We are developing a custom physics engine to reduce computational load, enabling higher performance for exploding rockets!

Shoot your Rockets into Space (coming soon)


Pilot your ship all the way from the launchpad to the surface of distant worlds!
This will become reality as soon as the surface and atmosphere simulation are added to our engine.

Explore the Solar System (work in progress)


Fly through the Solar System in real scale using our custom orbital engine that support very high accuracy calculations. No more round-off errors!

Non-Impulsive Maneuver


Our custom engine let you play with complex maneuvers and original trajectories.

features


  • realistic simulation of orbital dynamics using Kepler laws and patched conics
  • custom engine aimed for high performance and high precision
  • smooth orbit rendering even in extreme cases
  • deterministic simulation independent of time-wrap and SoI changes
  • efficient physics simulation of ship dynamics using Runge-Kutta 4
  • support for high time-wraps even while under acceleration
  • accurate itinerary planning

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Debian
  • Processor: 1.5 GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04
  • Processor: 3 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: Kepler Project

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 1.5 GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 3 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Build rockets and shoot them into space. Once you reach orbit, you are halfway to explore anywhere in the Solar System.
